copy.TUTORIAL_1:
Silver is the Lone Ranger's trusty steed, always
there to help save the day...
copy.TUTORIAL_2:
Your mission is to collect the Lone Ranger
at the Indian Camp, then race through town
and help him stop the runaway train...
copy.TUTORIAL_3: Press 'Space' or click the mouse to jump...
copy.TUTORIAL_4:
Hitting small obstacles will slow you down.
Hitting large obstacles will end the game.
Good luck!
